scripts.build: pnpm init-project & pnpm css-types & wp-scripts build assets/backend/admin.tsx assets/backend/index.tsx assets/backend/globals.tsx assets/gutenberg/blocks/booking-flow/src/booking-flow-block.ts assets/gutenberg/blocks/booking-flow/src/booking-flow-block-view.tsx
scripts.build:fe: pnpm init-project & pnpm css-types & wp-scripts build assets/frontend/index.tsx
scripts.start: pnpm init-project & pnpm css-types-watch & wp-env start --update --xdebug=develop,coverage,debug && wp-scripts start assets/backend/admin.tsx assets/backend/index.tsx assets/backend/globals.tsx assets/gutenberg/blocks/booking-flow/src/booking-flow-block.ts assets/gutenberg/blocks/booking-flow/src/booking-flow-block-view.tsx
scripts.start:hot: pnpm init-project & pnpm css-types-watch & wp-env start --update --xdebug=develop,coverage,debug && wp-scripts start assets/backend/admin.tsx assets/frontend/index.tsx assets/backend/globals.tsx assets/gutenberg/blocks/booking-flow/src/booking-flow-block.ts assets/gutenberg/blocks/booking-flow/src/booking-flow-block-view.tsx --hot
scripts.lint: pnpm lint:js && pnpm lint:css && pnpm phpcs:all
scripts.plugin-zip: pnpm build && pnpm composer install --no-dev && wp-scripts plugin-zip && pnpm composer install
scripts.phpcs:all: pnpm phpcs src includes tests/php tests/wordpress tests/bootstrap.php wpappointments.php
scripts.phpcs-fix:all: pnpm phpcs-fix src includes tests/php tests/wordpress tests/bootstrap.php wpappointments.php
scripts.zip: wp-env run cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wpappointments wp dist-archive . wpappointments.zip -- --path=/var/www/html
scripts.activate-plugin: wp-env run cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wpappointments wp plugin activate wpappointments
